body_html: Yup, I don't think that's the problem -- only the "master" worker should write the checkpoint. The bug seems to be non-deterministic, because I do have a single 4-machine run that succeeded (along with perhaps 20 failures).

body: Yup, I don't think that's the problem -- only the "master" worker should write the checkpoint. The bug seems to be non-deterministic, because I do have a single 4-machine run that succeeded (along with perhaps 20 failures).
